title: I want to know , till when I will get software and monthly security updates on pixel 4a ?
content:
Since pixel 4a is launching in October in India and software updates are available only till 2023 August as per Google's website for updates schedule
Need to know the software updates schedule for pixel 4a 

Also if I get an unlocked pixel 5 from US  , will it be covered in warranty in India as well ?
